mapper.select:
select t.DEV_BM as NAME from ywcl.gl_sbsx t where 1=1 and t.ISUSE='1' and t.taxorg = ${unitCode}
and t.IS_24H_CN='24小时'
and t.QSTB='全市通办'
and t.BSFS_CN <>'在厅式'
order by t.DEV_BM

select nvl(sum(t.sb_fs), '0') 申报数, nvl(sum(t.bs_fs), '0') 报税数, nvl(sum(t.yj_fs), '0') 发票验旧, nvl(sum(t.zprz_fs + t.hyrz_fs), '0') 发票认证, nvl(sum(t.nsqd_fs), '0') 纳税清单打印, nvl(sum(t.gspz_fs), '0') 个税凭证打印, nvl(sum(t.fply_fs), '0') 发票销售, nvl(sum(t.zpdk_fs + t.ppdk_fs + t.tydk_fs), '0') 发票代开 from ywcl.tj_ywltjzd t where 1=1 and to_date( t.czsj,'yyyy/MM/dd') >
and t.swjg_dm = ${unitCode}

select * from (select * from (select t.dev_bh, a.dev_bm as name, sum(t.zfs) value from ywcl.tj_ywltjzd t, ywcl.gl_sbzcxxjcb a, ywcl.gl_wdxx b where t.dev_bh = a.dev_bh and a.wd_id = b.wd_id and to_date( t.czsj,'yyyy/MM/dd') >=
and t.swjg_dm = ${unitCode} group by t.dev_bh, a.dev_bm) order by value desc) where value > 0 and rownum < 6

select sum(t.zfs) 业务总量, sum(t.sb_fs) 申报数, sum(t.bs_fs) 报税数, sum(t.yj_fs) 发票验旧, sum(t.zprz_fs + t.hyrz_fs) 发票认证, sum(t.nsqd_fs) 纳税清单打印, sum(t.gspz_fs) 个税凭证打印, sum(t.fply_fs) 发票销售, sum(t.zpdk_fs + t.ppdk_fs + t.tydk_fs) 发票代开 from ywcl.tj_ywltjzd t where to_date(t.czsj, 'yyyy/MM/dd') >= add_months(trunc(sysdate, 'mm'), -12) and to_date(t.czsj, 'yyyy/MM/dd') <= trunc(sysdate, 'mm') - 1 and t.swjg_dm = ${unitCode}
